mapper.insert: INSERT INTO elderly(ename, ebirth, eaddr, etel) VALUES(#{ename}, #{ebirth}, #{eaddr}, #{etel});
INSERT INTO devices(elderly, homeIoT, bandIoT) VALUES(#{ekey}, #{homeIoT});
mapper.select: select * from( SELECT ekey, ename, ebirth, etel, eaddr, homeIoT, staff, relative FROM elderly LEFT JOIN devices ON devices.elderly = ekey LEFT JOIN manage ON manage.elderly =ekey WHERE staff = "staff000001")a left join ( select * from( select ekey, stat from banddata where (ekey, measuredtime)in( select ekey, max(measuredtime) as measuredtime from banddata group by ekey ) order by measuredtime desc )t )tt ON tt.ekey = a.ekey;
